workshoptitle: SQL Meets JSON in Oracle Database: Unify Data with Duality Views, JSON Collections & MongoDB API

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to All-things-JSON in the Oracle Database.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: JSON Collections - the native storage for JSON documents
tutorials.description: Create JSON Collections to store documents in the database

tutorials.title: Lab 2: JSON Duality Views - JSON meets relational
Lab 3: MongoDB Plug-and-Play - Full MongoDB compatibility to work with JSON Collections and Duality Views
tutorials.description: MongoDB compatibility with the MongoDB API

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Connect to Autonomous Database with Mongo Shell
Lab 5: Interact with JSON Documents through Database Actions
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
